solution_line_template: Vincent earns ${fantasy_book_price} x {fantasy_books_sold_per_day}= ${<<{fantasy_book_price}*{fantasy_books_sold_per_day}={daily_fantasy_earnings}>>}{daily_fantasy_earnings} for selling {fantasy_books_sold_per_day} fantasy books per day.
The price of the literature book is ${fantasy_book_price}/{literature_price_divisor} = ${<<{fantasy_book_price}/{literature_price_divisor}={literature_book_price}>>}{literature_book_price} each.

He earns ${literature_book_price} x {literature_books_sold_per_day}= ${<<{literature_book_price}*{literature_books_sold_per_day}={daily_literature_earnings}>>}{daily_literature_earnings} per day for selling {literature_books_sold_per_day} literature books.

So the total money he earns per day is ${daily_literature_earnings} + ${daily_fantasy_earnings}= ${<<{daily_literature_earnings}+{daily_fantasy_earnings}={total_daily_earnings}>>}{total_daily_earnings}.
Therefore, he will earn ${total_daily_earnings} x {number_of_days}= ${<<{total_daily_earnings}*{number_of_days}={total_earnings_five_days}>>}{total_earnings_five_days} after {number_of_days} days.
